Description.enUS:
Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.

Can attack ground units.
Description.zhCN:
Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.

Can attack ground units.
Description.koKR:
Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.

Can attack ground units.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.zhCN: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.koKR: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.zhCN: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.koKR: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.

Tooltip.enUS: Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.
Tooltip.zhCN: Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.
Tooltip.koKR: Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.

Tooltip.enUS: Creep generator structure. Can mutate into Sunken Colony or Spore Colony. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures.
Tooltip.zhCN: Creep generator structure. Can mutate into Sunken Colony or Spore Colony. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures.
Tooltip.koKR: Creep generator structure. Can mutate into Sunken Colony or Spore Colony. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures.

Tooltip.enUS: Mutated over a undefined to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Tooltip.zhCN: Mutated over a undefined to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Tooltip.koKR: Mutated over a undefined to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
